sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"学生"之意。
means: pupil ： 特指中小学生，尤其是小学生。
student ： 普通用词，可指中学生，但主要指高等学校或专科学校的学生。
learner ： 通俗用词，指某一门学问上的初学者，尤指成年的初学者。
scholar ： 可指一切学生，尤指学识渊博的某一学科的学者。

sentence.Network_en: In 1978 there were 884 students at a lecturer/student ratio of 1:15.
The fact of the matter is that student finances are stretched.
Rules governing student conduct relaxed somewhat in recent years.
sentence.Network_cn: 近年来约束学生行为的规定有所放宽。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin student- 'applying oneself to', from the verb studere, related to studium 'painstaking application'

entry.def: A student is a person who is studying at a university or college.

example.ex: Warren's eldest son is an art student, at St Martin's.
example.tran: 沃伦的大儿子是圣马丁学院艺术系的学生。

entry.def: A student is a child who is studying at a secondary school.
Someone who is a student of a particular subject is interested in the subject and spends time learning about it.

example.ex: ...a passionate student of nineteenth century history.
example.tran: 热衷于 19 世纪历史的研究者

means.word_mean: 1. a learner who is enrolled in an educational institution
2. a learned person (especially in the humanities); someone who by long study has gained mastery in one or more disciplines

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"……的"; 2. 表名词,通常表示"……人",也可以表示其他具体物.; 3. 表名词,"……药剂"

stems_affixes.word_buile: excel优胜,超越+ent……的→excellent卓越的,极好的
insist坚持+ent……的→adj.坚持的;逼人注意的
sent感觉+i+ent……的→adj.有知觉的,知悉的
sil+ent……的→adj.寂静的,沉默的,无声的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 短暂的,转瞬即逝的;临时的,暂住的
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans转移+i+ent……的→adj.短暂的,转瞬即逝的;临时的,暂住的
reside居住+ent……人→n.居民,常住者 adj.居住的
deterge使清洁+ent……药剂→adj.净化的 n.清洁剂
correspond通信+ent……人→n.记者,通讯员;通信者
reside居住+ent……人→n.居民,常住者 adj.居住的

stems_affixes.value_cn: [大中学校的]学生;研究者,学者

stems_affixes.word_buile: deterge使清洁+ent……药剂→adj.净化的 n.清洁剂
re再+ag做+ent……药剂→再次作用→反应,引申为化学试剂

Sentence.sentence: Mark is not fit to take charge of the Student Union.

sentences.en: The students put up a poster on the bulletin board.
sentences.cn: 学生们在布告牌上贴了一张海报。

sentences.en: He is a close student of birds.
sentences.cn: 他是一位鸟类学研究者。

jushi.english: On rainy days the students play ball games in the gymnasium.
jushi.chinese: 下雨天学生们就在体育馆里打球。

jushi.english: This list of hints helped the new students a lot.
jushi.chinese: 这一系列的提示对新生帮助很大。

jushi.english: A good teacher should learn how to put across his ideas to his students.
jushi.chinese: 一位好的老师应当学会如何把自己的想法给学生讲清楚。
